verses.verse: וְאֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Now these were the sons דָויִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who נֽוֹלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> which were born ל֖וֹ בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> unto him in Hebron הַבְּכ֣וֹר ׀ <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn אַמְנֹ֗ן <S%H550><s%> Amnon לַאֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <S%H293><s%> of Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔ית <S%H3159><s%> the Jezreelitess שֵׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> the second דָּנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel לַאֲבִיגַ֖יִל <S%H26><s%> of Abigail הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽית׃ <S%H3762><s%> the Carmelitess

הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> The third לְאַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַעֲכָ֔ה <S%H4601><s%> of Maachah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter תַּלְמַ֖י <S%H8526><s%> of Talmai מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גְּשׁ֑וּר <S%H1650><s%> of Geshur הָרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> the fourth אֲדֹנִיָּ֥ה <S%H138><s%> Adonijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַגִּֽית׃ <S%H2294><s%> of Haggith

הַחֲמִישִׁ֥י <S%H2549><s%> The fifth שְׁפַטְיָ֖ה <S%H8203><s%> Shephatiah לַאֲבִיטָ֑ל <S%H37><s%> of Abital הַשִּׁשִּׁ֥י <S%H8345><s%> the sixth יִתְרְעָ֖ם <S%H3507><s%> Ithream לְעֶגְלָ֥ה <S%H5698><s%> by Eglah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> his wife

שִׁשָּׁה֙ <S%H8337><s%> [These] six נֽוֹלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> were born ל֣וֹ בְחֶבְר֔וֹן <S%H2275><s%> unto him in Hebron וַיִּ֨מְלָךְ־ <S%H4427><s%> and there he reigned שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> and there שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> and six חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> months וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty וְשָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <S%H7969><s%> and three שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem ס

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These נוּלְּדוּ־ <S%H3205><s%> And these were born ל֖וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלָ֑יִם <S%H3389><s%> unto him in Jerusalem שִׁ֠מְעָא <S%H8092><s%> Shimea וְשׁוֹבָ֞ב <S%H7727><s%> and Shobab וְנָתָ֤ן <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <S%H702><s%> four לְבַת־ שׁ֖וּעַ <S%H1340><s%> of Bathshua בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עַמִּיאֵֽל׃ <S%H5988><s%> of Ammiel
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <S%H2984><s%> Ibhar וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <S%H476><s%> also and Elishama וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <S%H467><s%> and Eliphelet
וְנֹ֥גַהּ <S%H5052><s%> And Nogah וְנֶ֖פֶג <S%H5298><s%> and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3309><s%> and Japhia
וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֧ע <S%H476><s%> And Elishama וְאֶלְיָדָ֛ע <S%H450><s%> and Eliada וֶאֱלִיפֶ֖לֶט <S%H467><s%> and Eliphelet תִּשְׁעָֽה׃ <S%H8672><s%> nine

כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [These were] all the sons דָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִלְּבַ֥ד <S%H905><s%> alone בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> beside the sons פִֽילַגְשִׁ֖ים <S%H6370><s%> of the concubines וְתָמָ֥ר <S%H8559><s%> and Tamar אֲחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H269><s%> their sister פ

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon's רְחַבְעָ֑ם <S%H7346><s%> [was] Rehoboam אֲבִיָּ֥ה <S%H29><s%> Abia בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אָסָ֥א <S%H609><s%> Asa בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> Jehoshaphat בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
יוֹרָ֥ם <S%H3141><s%> Joram בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֲחַזְיָ֥הוּ <S%H274><s%> Ahaziah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3101><s%> Joash בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
אֲמַצְיָ֧הוּ <S%H558><s%> Amaziah בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son עֲזַרְיָ֥ה <S%H5838><s%> Azariah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יוֹתָ֥ם <S%H3147><s%> Jotham בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
אָחָ֥ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son חִזְקִיָּ֥הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
אָמ֥וֹן <S%H526><s%> Amon בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <S%H2977><s%> Josiah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יֹאשִׁיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> [were] the firstborn יוֹחָנָ֔ן <S%H3110><s%> Johanan הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> the second יְהוֹיָקִ֑ים <S%H3079><s%> Jehoiakim הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> the third צִדְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah הָרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> the fourth שַׁלּֽוּם׃ <S%H7967><s%> Shallum

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יְהוֹיָקִ֑ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim יְכָנְיָ֥ה <S%H3204><s%> Jeconiah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son צִדְקִיָּ֥ה <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יְכָנְיָ֣ה <S%H3204><s%> of Jeconiah אַסִּ֔ר <S%H617><s%> Assir שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H7597><s%> Salathiel בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וּמַלְכִּירָ֥ם <S%H4443><s%> Malchiram וּפְדָיָ֖ה <S%H6305><s%> also and Pedaiah וְשֶׁנְאַצַּ֑ר <S%H8137><s%> and Shenazar יְקַמְיָ֥ה <S%H3359><s%> Jecamiah הוֹשָׁמָ֖ע <S%H1953><s%> Hoshama וּנְדַבְיָֽה׃ <S%H5072><s%> and Nedabiah

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons פְדָיָ֔ה <S%H6305><s%> of Pedaiah זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H2216><s%> [were] Zerubbabel וְשִׁמְעִ֑י <S%H8096><s%> and Shimei וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and the sons זְרֻבָּבֶל֙ <S%H2216><s%> of Zerubbabel מְשֻׁלָּ֣ם <S%H4918><s%> Meshullam וַחֲנַנְיָ֔ה <S%H2608><s%> and Hananiah וּשְׁלֹמִ֖ית <S%H8019><s%> and Shelomith אֲחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H269><s%> their sister

וַחֲשֻׁבָ֡ה <S%H2807><s%> And Hashubah וָ֠אֹהֶל <S%H169><s%> and Ohel וּבֶרֶכְיָ֧ה <S%H1296><s%> and Berechiah וַֽחֲסַדְיָ֛ה <S%H2619><s%> and Hasadiah י֥וּשַׁב חֶ֖סֶד <S%H3142><s%> Jushabhesed חָמֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H2568><s%> five

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <S%H2608><s%> of Hananiah פְּלַטְיָ֣ה <S%H6410><s%> Pelatiah וִישַֽׁעְיָ֑ה <S%H3470><s%> and Jesaiah בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> the sons רְפָיָה֙ <S%H7509><s%> of Rephaiah בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַרְנָ֔ן <S%H770><s%> of Arnan בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons עֹבַדְיָ֖ה <S%H5662><s%> of Obadiah בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons שְׁכַנְיָֽה׃ <S%H7935><s%> of Shechaniah ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שְׁכַנְיָ֖ה <S%H7935><s%> of Shechaniah שְׁמַעְיָ֑ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons שְׁמַעְיָ֗ה <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah חַטּ֡וּשׁ <S%H2407><s%> Hattush וְ֠יִגְאָל <S%H3008><s%> and Igeal וּבָרִ֧יחַ <S%H1282><s%> and Bariah וּנְעַרְיָ֛ה <S%H5294><s%> and Neariah וְשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H8202><s%> and Shaphat שִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H8337><s%> six

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons נְעַרְיָ֗ה <S%H5294><s%> of Neariah אֶלְיוֹעֵינַ֧י <S%H454><s%> Elioenai וְחִזְקִיָּ֛ה <S%H2396><s%> and Hezekiah וְעַזְרִיקָ֖ם <S%H5840><s%> and Azrikam שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אֶלְיוֹעֵינַ֗י <S%H454><s%> of Elioenai [הֹדַיְוָהוּ כ] (הֹודַוְיָ֡הוּ <S%H1937><s%> Hodevah ק) וְאֶלְיָשִׁ֡יב <S%H475><s%> and Eliashib וּפְלָיָ֡ה <S%H6411><s%> and Pelaiah וְ֠עַקּוּב <S%H6126><s%> and Akkub וְיוֹחָנָ֧ן <S%H3110><s%> and Johanan וּדְלָיָ֛ה <S%H1806><s%> and Dalaiah וַעֲנָ֖נִי <S%H6054><s%> and Anani שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> seven ס
